## remove() function

Remove an item from an array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function remove<T>(l: Array<T>, v: T): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  l | Array&lt;T&gt; | Array to remove the item from |
|  v | T | Item to remove.  true if the item was removed, false otherwise. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
